title: ENGINE - ATLAS PHOTO AFTER EOD*2
time_sequence: GR - ATLAS PHASE 6.3 - PROCESSING AFTER STAR 2

task_list.instruction_title:
Import files in order to Generate Reports / perform an Atlas photo after Star 1 - Phase 14 of the Engine :
_- FTC_ATLAS_MOTEUR_0160_ACCOUNTS_CTRL_FACCX1
- FTC_ATLAS_MOTEUR_0161_ACCOUNTS_CTRL_FACCX2
- FTC_ATLAS_MOTEUR_0000_PB_FACCX3
- FTC_ATLAS_MOTEUR_0179_INVESTMENTS_FPLAX1
- FTC_ATLAS_MOTEUR_0157_SECUPOS_EXTRACT_FPOSX2
- FTC_ATLAS_MOTEUR_0158_LOANS_EXTRACT_FLOAX1

Generate the following Reports

EXCEL_C2006_ATLAS_FUSION_ACCOUNTS_WITH_EOD_DIFF
